data.eml:eml: A new vertebrate for Europe: the discovery of a range-restricted relict viper in the western Italian Alps

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Samuele Ghielmi, Michele Menegon, Stuart J. Marsden, Lorenzo Laddaga, Sylvain Ursenbacher (2016): A new vertebrate for Europe: the discovery of a range-restricted relict viper in the western Italian Alps. J Zool Syst Evol Res 54 (3): 161-173, DOI: 10.1111/jzs.12138
